title: The world has invented a special ink that can able u to dream books
body:
The books aren't magical but the ink is 
*(It can be a special drugs plant that makes the ink....nahhh mehehehe)*

If you read the special ink lettered book, it will slowly pull you inside the book you are reading 
*(You will start dreaming the book)*

And you will wake up inside the book and you will a side character in the book until the book ends 
*(like a special movie)*

What Book would you read if these special books existed in our world?

http://images.bookcrossing.com/images/journalpics/973/08/9734408.jpg

I would read the Golden Compass, would be interesting to see what kind of pet I would get from the book mehehehe
